mapper.select: SELECT staff_id staffId, staff_name staffName, shelter_id shelterId FROM staff WHERE staff_id = #{staffId} AND staff_pw = PASSWORD(#{staffPw})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO staff( staff_id, staff_email, shelter_id, staff_name, staff_phone, staff_active, staff_level, staff_pw, update_date ) VALUE( #{staffId}, #{staffEmail}, #{shelterId}, #{staffName}, #{staffPhone}, 1, 0, PASSWORD(#{staffPw}), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE staff SET staff_email = #{staffEmail}, staff_name = #{staffName}, staff_phone = #{staffPhone}, staff_pw = PASSWORD(#{staffPw}) WHERE staff_id = #{staffId} AND staff_pw = PASSWORD(#{staffPw})
